name: Eandis System Operator
goal: Eandis System Operator is a distribution system operator (DSO) in Belgium, with a market share of around 45% and 54% for electricity and gas respectively, based on number of access points (European Article Numbers - EANs). Its main area of operations is the Flemish region, where it serves 229 municipalities, representing a market share of around 78% and 83% in electricity and gas respectively based on number of access points. Eandisâ€™s mandate comprises the regulated activities of electricity/gas distribution through the medium and low voltage/pressure grids, along with maintenance and repair of the distribution grid, collection and distribution of metering data, public lighting, and certain public service obligations. Eandis also performs several non-regulated activities, such as district heating and energy services to local authorities.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Trans-European Networks
